issue.title: Splitwise Clone
issue.body:
## Overview
Simple expense-sharing app.

## Features
- Google OAuth login
- Create groups
- Add expenses (split equally)
- View balances

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 App Router
- Tailwind + shadcn/ui
- SQLite (better-sqlite3)
- NextAuth.js

## Pages
- Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail

ems.task: Initialize Next.js 14 project with TypeScript, configure Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui, set up package.json with all dependencies (next-auth, better-sqlite3, @auth/prisma-adapter), create tsconfig.json, .gitignore, .env.local template, and basic project structure

analysisSummary: Build a Splitwise-like expense sharing app with Next.js 14, NextAuth.js for Google OAuth, SQLite database, and shadcn/ui components. Features include group creation, equal-split expense tracking, and balance viewing across 5 pages (Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail).

pendingEMs.task: Implement authentication system with NextAuth.js Google OAuth provider, create database schema and models (User, Group, Expense, ExpenseSplit), build API routes for auth callbacks and session management, set up SQLite database initialization and migration scripts

Create all UI components and pages using shadcn/ui: landing page, login page, dashboard with group list, group detail page with expense list, expense creation modal, and balance display components. Implement client-side state management and form handling

Build API routes for group management (create, list, detail), expense operations (add, list, calculate splits), and balance calculations. Implement business logic for equal splitting algorithms and debt simplification. Add server actions for all CRUD operations
